title: Natural Loofah Body Scrubber Exfoliating Sponge
description: Natural Loofah Body Scrubber Exfoliating Sponge is a perfect body care tool for gentle exfoliation and cleansing. It is made of soft material that is gentle on the skin and helps remove dirt, grime and dead skin cells. The sponge is anti-bacterial and easy to use. Perfect for all skin types, it helps to keep your skin feeling smooth and soft.

title: Reusable Waterproof EVA Shower Cap for Women
description: Protect your hair from water and keep it dry with this double-layer shower cap. Made from EVA material, this waterproof shower cap is reusable and comes in an adult style. Keep your hair looking beautiful and healthy with this anti-bacterial shower cap.

title: Long Silicone Bath Brush - Exfoliating Body Scrubber for Men & Women
description: Get a smooth and soft skin with this Long Silicone Bath Brush! This body scrubber is perfect for exfoliating and massaging your skin with its soft bristles. It comes in pink, purple, green and blue and is suitable for both men and women. Enjoy a relaxing shower with this body scrubber and get a brighter and healthier skin!

title: Long Silicone Bath Brush | Exfoliating Body Scrub for Men & Women
description: Get a deep clean with this long silicone bath brush! This body scrubber features soft bristles and is perfect for exfoliating and massaging your back, helping to remove dead skin cells and dirt. It comes in four colors and is suitable for both men and women. Enjoy a luxurious spa-like experience with this bath brush!

title: Adolph Shower Shampoo - Essential Travel & Home Care
description: Enjoy a luxurious shower experience with Adolph Shower Shampoo. This essential shampoo is formulated to effectively remove dandruff and maintain scalp. It is enriched with five senses perfume for scalp soothing and a classic fragrance of tender skin. Perfect for travel and home care, this moisturizing shampoo will leave your skin feeling soft and silky.

title: 2 in 1 Bath and Shampoo Brush Silicone Shower Body Scrubber
description: Get the most out of your shower with this 2-in-1 bath and shampoo brush! Made of soft silicone, it features an exfoliating body brush head and a scalp massager brush on one side, and a shampoo brush with massage on the other. Perfect for wet and dry use, this brush is a great way to keep your skin healthy and clean.

title: Disposable Shower Cap Waterproof Hair Cover
description: This Disposable Shower Cap is made of thickened PE material and is waterproof. It is perfect for household use, beauty salons, and hair dyeing and treatment. It is suitable for general application and is a great way to keep your hair dry while showering.

title: Adult Waterproof Shower Cap with Elastic Band
description: Keep your hair dry and protected while showering with this stylish waterproof shower cap. Made from polyester and EVA, this shower cap is double layered for added protection and is designed with an elastic band for a secure fit. Available in 8 different colors, it is the perfect accessory for your bathroom.

title: Back Scrubber Wash Body Shower Brush Mesh Sponge Bath Ball
description: Clean and pamper your body with this super soft and simple design bath ball. Perfect for a relaxing shower or bath experience. Comes in a range of colors to suit your preference. Dimensions: 15cm.

title: Cure Natural Aqua Gel Exfoliating Care 250g
description: Get softer, smoother and brighter skin with Cure Natural Aqua Gel Exfoliating Care! This best-selling skincare product in Japan for 7 years effectively removes dead skin cells to help in skin renewal. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin, this product helps to prevent skin problems such as enlarged pores, blackheads, pimples, blemishes and dull skin tone. Get this quality assurance product today!

title: 10Pcs Organic Bath Gift Set - Natural Handmade Bath Bombs with Rich Essential Oils
description: Pamper yourself with this luxurious 10-piece Organic Bath Gift Set. This set includes Natural Handmade Bath Bombs with Rich Essential Oils that will help to moisturize and relax your skin. Perfect for a spa-like experience at home, these bombs are made with dried flowers and are sure to leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Enjoy the luxurious scent and experience of these Bath Bombs and give your body the care it deserves. NET WT: 215g.

title: Organic Cold-Pressed Rosehips Oil
description: Get all the benefits of rosehips oil with this 100% pure organic cold-pressed unrefined oil. It is the perfect moisturiser and emollient for your skin and can help with tissue repair. Use it on your face and body for a nourishing and hydrating experience.

title: Organic Jojoba Oil 100ml | Herbal Sense
description: Get nourishing skin care with Herbal Sense 100% Pure Organic Cold Pressed/Unrefined Jojoba Oil. This oil is perfect for aiding eczema skin, body care, makeup removal, and as a moisturizer. It is free from any additives or preservatives, making it a safe and natural choice for your skin.

title: Relax with Essential Oils and Toys - Bath Fizzies for Kids
description: Enjoy a luxurious spa experience with these bath bombs for kids. Infused with vegan essential oils and containing a surprise toy, these bath bombs promise to make bath time fun and relaxing. Moisturize your skin with these bath fizzies and feel refreshed and rejuvenated.

title: Bentong Ginger Bath Pack
description: Enjoy a luxurious bath experience with Cheong Hoong's Bentong Ginger Bath Pack. This premium bath pack is made with 100% natural Bentong Highland ginger, containing no preservatives, colourings, or flavourings. Pamper yourself with this luxurious bath pack and enjoy a relaxing and moisturizing experience.

title: Silicone Body Scrubber Brush for Deep Cleaning
description: Get a deep clean with this silicone body scrubber brush! Made of food grade natural silicone material, it is heat-resistant and non absorbent, making it easier to clean and dry than traditional bath towels. The soft silicone bristles help to exfoliate dead skin cells and promote blood circulation while the anti-slip design provides a secure grip. Perfect for home or hotel bathroom use, this scrubber brush offers a deep cleanse without any chemical odor. Dimensions: 8.5 x 8.5 cm. Color: Blue Purple, Pink.

title: Double Layer Mesh Soap Bag/Soap Foaming Net
description: Keep your skin feeling clean and refreshed with this double layer mesh soap bag/soap foaming net. Crafted from nylon, this bag is gentle on skin and features a lanyard design for easy storage. Perfect for use with handmade soaps and facial cleansers, this bag is small and convenient to use. Randomly coloured, this bag is a great addition to your skincare routine.

title: MUMENG Nylon Loofah Flower Bath Ball / Mesh Net Ball
description: Welcome to MUMENG Store! This bath ball is made of nylon material and is perfect for exfoliating and cleaning pores. It features a fine mesh, is soft and comfortable, and is recyclable and environmentally friendly. Each bath sponge comes with a thick cotton lanyard for easy hanging. Get yours today!

title: Super Big Titan Gel - Discreet Packaging
description: Get superior moisturizing, whitening and sun protection with this Super Big Titan Gel! Comes with discreet packaging to ensure your privacy. Enjoy the benefits of this product with its easy to use application. Perfect for those who want to keep their skin healthy and hydrated.

title: Double Layer Soap Net Bag for Foaming Facial
description: This double layer soap net bag is perfect for foaming facial cleansers and scrubs. It helps to create a foamy lather for a deep cleanse. Great for travel and everyday use. Made of durable material for longevity.
